name: Lost In Doors
description:
Lost in Doors is a puzzle game about doors and suprising ways of interacting with them. Explore the absurd and mysterious world filled with only doors and try to solve all its puzzles. This version of the game is the first demo and the developement of the game continues still

Controls: WASD + mouse

Note: There is a bug in the current build that sometimes results in player not being correctly teleported when going trough a portal door. If the bug happens, please try walking trough the door slower. Also, note that the portal doors are usually one way only.

CREDITS

Miro Aurela: Lead Design, Programming

Camilla Pentti: Visual Art, Game Design

Olga Tasanko: Audio, Game Design
